FTS Documentation

2.4

This will be the developers documentation of the FTS API. For now there are only a few documentation modules.

FTS includes mainly the following components:

  • object system (lang/mess/)
  • DSP system (lang/dsp/, lang/ftl/)
  • scheduler (runtime/scheduler/)
  • timing system (runtime/time/)
  • device abstractions (runtime/devices/)
  • file handling (runtime/files/)
  • client/server communication (runtime/client/, tiles/messtile.*)
  • configuration handling: UCS (tiles/ucs.*)
  • system utilities: memory management, module sytem, ... (sys/)
  • platform dependend components: dynamic loading, memory management, scheduling, ... (non-portable/)
  • misc utilities: hash tables, sampling rate conversion routines, four-point interpolation, ... (lang/utils/)
This documentation is generated automatically from the comments in the header files of FTS by the doxygen documentation system by Dimitri van Heesch.

jMax server kernel documentation (FTS 2.4)
